name: Pinball Dreams HD
description:
One more time, the veritable blast from the past, a legend amongst pinballs is back - on OS X!

This time we are giving you a HD-3D version with all the 4 original tables and it should work on basically all the Intel Macs - however some really old ones with a GMA950 GPU are not recommended.

20 years ago Pinball Dreams almost single-handedly created the pinball simulator genre. 20 years later it is still one of the best pinball simulations ever created with addictive tables giving hours and hours of challenge and fun!

The game has 3 different camera modes, full screen toggle and anti-aliasing.
